name: Knight and Fencer
description:
A little humble project created with PixiJS about two guardians. The core concept is about raising the character's offense/damage by hitting monsters, once the character gets hit though, the damage gets cut by a lot. This concept is by no means original, it's actually inspired by a Flash game by cello_cken (Japanese) and while the game differs quite a lot from the inspiration, it's still noteworthy nevertheless. I had lots of fun making this game and by trying to lower my ambitions I finally managed to release a finished game. Taking a simple game and making my own implementation of it is generally a very fun thing to do for me.

A sequel might happen in a rather long time from now, with more content and characters.

Coding, Art and Music by Naryunic

Controls:

Point and Click: Move around

Space: Attack

Shift+Space: Turbo Attack (Fencer/Lilli only)

Shift: Shield Block (Knight/Slars only)

M key: Toggle music on/off

N key: Toggle sounds on/off
